page.title: 06SPORTS&HOBBIES,DRAYTON AREA
page.content: The current craze at the moment is for{Bicycle Motor Cross,}or{BMX}for short,a mixture of cycling and cross-country motorcycling.Mounted on special cycles,the riders (normally boys) either race over a special course or perform "freestyle" stunts. Other popular sports include {cricket,football and Rugby Union}for which there are facilities nearby. There are also facilities for{squash, {badminton}and{swimming,}as well as the {water sports centre}on the gravel pits at Costessey. Many children,especially girls, enjoy the local facilities for{horse {and pony riding}offered at nearby riding schools.Drayton is fortunate in having the{Bob Carter Centre}an indoor sports and social club,as well as good {fishing}on the Wensum and some playing fields within easy reach.
